sub_title: I simplify audio and written content creation for sustainables and creative companies
summary:
Hello !
If you've made it this far, I can help you!
Find out how here! 👉

👉 Are you an entrepreneur and would like to present quality and optimized content on your website?
👉 Do you often feel like you're wasting time and energy taking care of writing or improving the content of your website?
👉 Do you often want to publish blog posts on your site, but would you like someone to read you to check their quality?
👉 Are you wasting time, focus and energy taking care of your podcast?
👉 Do you feel that you would like to focus on the essentials by delegating the time-consuming and energy-consuming micro-tasks of your daily life as an entrepreneur?

Agreed, that's a lot of questions...
If you answered "yes" to any of them, it's time for you to talk about how I can help you lighten your daily life and your mental load.

If you answered yes to any of these questions, we need to talk, you and me 🙋‍!

👨‍💻Right arm of sustainable and positive entrepreneurs, I suggest you call on me for the following missions:
- writing in French of the content of your website and your blog articles;
- English -> French translation;
- proofreading and optimization of existing content;
- content integration on WordPress;
- podcast management (audit, editing of episodes with addition of intro and outro, writing descriptions, planning, creation and recycling of content for Instagram and LinkedIn, transcription, organization of interviews, etc.);
- animation of communities;
- strategic brainstorming.

💪 Curious, proactive, meticulous, I gave myself a mission: to help web entrepreneurs with a positive impact to refocus on the heart of their activity.

Essentialist professional coaches, hosts of positive podcasts, sustainable and human-scale travel agencies, Chinese medicine practitioners, ethical communication agencies… here are some examples of positive impact businesses that I am used to to accompany.

Anyone who triggers a smile, tickles the taste buds, creates unforgettable memories or invites you to live a life more in tune with yourself...

Contact me by private message to discuss your needs!

treasury_media.title: Réserve ton café virtuel pour qu'on discute de tes besoins !

education.field_of_study: Tourisme appliquée à l'organisation de festivals et d'expositions artistiques

profile_positions.title: Digital right arm of sustainable and positive entrepreneurs

profile_positions.description:
I helped Léo-pol the founder of Podium Content: 

- to receive the various content orders (blog articles, white papers, web pages...) from his clients; 
- to plan the production of this content with the freelance editors of his team. 
- to deliver the ordered content after the writing phase. 

The results of our collaboration? 
- Léo-pol was able to take his first vacation during the 2nd month of our collaboration (then several times during our collaboration). 
- He was able to free up time to develop his client portfolio. 

I left Podium Content at the end of April 2023 to free up time for the development of my podcast manager activity.
profile_positions.title: Content manager

profile_positions.description:
After spending 6 months building 2 teams, I chose to refocus on the team where I had particular added value for:

- manage a team of 6 writers (on fixed-term contract and freelance),
- distribute the schedule of content to be written within the team,
- set up a wiki dedicated to the editorial team (allowing the development of technologies taken from TravelBird to all the editorial services of Secret Escapes),
- improve newly created processes for the Catalague team.

I left the company to decide MY next professionnal steps.
profile_positions.title: Team lead editorials Global Catalogue

profile_positions.description:
After TravelBird went bankrupt, Secret Escapes bought out the various technologies and brand associated with the company. 

I was hired to: 
- recruit the team dedicated to the Catalogue product (= activities directly inspired by TravelBird's offer). 
- recruit the new Dutch team of editors dedicated to the Flash Sales product (historic activity of Secret Escapes) after the relocation of the team from Berlin to Amsterdam. 
- transmit TravelBird usage processes at editorial level to the new company. 
- manage the teams on a daily basis. 
- ensure the link with the teams in connection with the editorial staff (sales, marketing, planning, etc.). 

After 8 months, I asked to refocus on a single team: the Catalogue team.
profile_positions.title: Team lead editorials Flash sales Benelux and Global Catalogue

profile_positions.description:
In this new position at TravelBird, I was able to :

- Supervise up to 10 editors from the french, belgian and danish team,
- Conduct weekly team meetings and biweekly one-on-ones,
- Evaluate performance of every editor twice a year, 
- Recruite new editors for the team, 
- Writing inspiring offers for the french speaking market, 
- Single contact point for key stakeholders like product planners, central sourcing, product makers, travel advisors and other web editing teams.
profile_positions.title: Team leader editing France, Belgique and Denmark at TravelBird

profile_positions.description: Supervising up to 8 editors from the French and Danish team, managing the production planning of offers for travelbird.fr and travelbird.dk, managing relations with the marketing department, sales department, customer service and other editing teams, reporting to the Chief of Operations, recruiting and training new editors, facilitating and scheduling team meetings. evaluating the performance of editors (twice a year), conducting face-to-face bi-weekly meetings with each of the editors, rethinking procedures and workflows to improve the editing team's efficiency
profile_positions.title: Team leader Editing France and Denmark

profile_positions.description:
Thanks to this first promotion at TravelBird, I was able to: 

- Supervise up to 4 editors for the France team. 
- Manage the editorial schedule to distribute it to the whole team, 
- Organize and lead weekly team meetings and bi-weekly face-to-face interviews, 
- Evaluate the performance of each editor twice a year, 
- Recruit and train new writers, 
- Write inspiring offers for the French market, 
- Be the single point of contact for sales representatives, category managers, customer service and marketing managers, 
- Rethink procedures and organization internal teams for better productivity.
profile_positions.title: Team leader Editing France

profile_positions.description: Creating new attractive offers for the french  website of Travelbird, translating existing offers, achieving newsletters with Copernica in connection with the marketing department, optimizing the attractiveness of a new offer in connection with the sales department, conducting recruitment interviews and training of new editors

profile_positions.description: Creating new attractive offers for the french belgium website of Travelbird, translating existing offers, achieving newsletters with Copernica in connection with the marketing department, optimizing the attractiveness of a new offer in connection with the sales department, conducting recruitment interviews and training of new editors

profile_positions.description:
Coordinating the planning and logistic for HP Indigo customers.
- Ensuring that the cases are dispatched to the correct partner or field engineer. 
- Ensuring that the parts recommended for the case are delivered in acceptable timescales and in the most economical way. 
- Keeping HP customers and delivery partners informed of case status and actions to take via e-mail and phone.
- Retaining ownership of each event until problem is resolved or solution is identified. 
- Routing case and liaise with appropriate department to ensure correct solution.
profile_positions.title: Front Office Onsite Coordinator
